item.title: Install Centos 7 with libreboot.
item.description: I really wanted to have CentOS on a laptop with libreboot. I had some trouble getting things to run after install, later I found a post on the libreboot website that said what to do. The same solution can be used for redhat \ fedora installs. So here is what I did: Download latest CentOS, boot from usb stick or some other way, personally I use drivedroidall the time , very nice app to have installed on the phone, grab the iso, copy it to phone, emulate usb cdrom and boot from that.
